attributes.action: give the streets back to the ordinary citizens of this land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned demand that the government gives the streets back to the ordinary citizens of this land.
We do not want pledges of crackdowns and tougher sentences. We want ACTION.
Tougher sentences are of no use if the offenders are not caught. Laws are of no use if they are not enforced.
Too many people are dying in the streets from firearms knives and beatings. 
Take the streets back from these hooligans and give them back to us, the ordinary citizens. Let us walk the streets in safety.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
